WhiteFox::

The iceberg melted away. Her Pod was just off the coast of what would 
be California. The beacon signal was starting to fade.  The energy 
supply was slowly running out.  After drifting with the currents, the 
pod slowly made it's way into a large bay with a small island in the 
middle. The pod finally beached itself on the far north side of the 
bay.  The pod opened. The computer initiated the awaking proccesses. 
WhiteFox started to groan a she started to wake up. Her power supply 
was only as 21% and would last much longer.  She opened her optics 
and saw daylight for the first time since she had left her home world.
She sat up and looked around. The salt air was strong to her nose.  
She very slowly climbed out of the pod.  She stood there on shaking 
legs and looked around. Standing at only 4'1", she hoped she would 
run into maximal friendly bots. Taking a few steps to the East, she 
noticed a funny smell.  She looked down and noticed her current 
physical condition.  The animal portion of her seamed to have rotted 
away.  Only tattered parts of fox pelt remained on her unpolished 
metalic body. The tattered palt barely covered her form. She lifted 
one peice from her hip and shook her head. "Why wasn't the 
trasformation complete?"  She turned and went back to the pod.  She 
ran a diognostic and action record. The record showed the pod landing 
and being damaged in the crash. Hence her unfinished maximal mode.  
She sighed and lowered her head. "Well, then, I guess I shall have to 
stay like this untill I figure out what to do next."  She reached 
into a small compartment under the control console and withdrew a 
plasma pistol. She checked to make sure it had enough charge, which 
it did. She put it away in her side compartment and started walking 
East. With luck, she might find someone who mght help her with her 
mode.
